text: @realDonaldTrump Jesus would be rolling in his grave right now, you fake Christian asshat.  Maybe next year, as an ex-president, you can tweet to your remaining followers “HAPPY CORONAVIRUS DAY” to celebrate the first US casualty also, seems like your style.
